bladder_motor¶

robot.commands.bladder.bladder_motor.bladder_motor

class bladder_motor(address, mot, event, enc1=None, enc2=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

__init__ Motor controller for motors in the inflatable bladder.

Parameters:

  • address (int) – Address of motorcontroller

  • mot (bool) – ?possibly direction of motor?

  • event (Threading.event) – Event for when motor is done with a movement

  • enc1 (int, optional) – Encoder pin one, defaults to None

  • enc2 (int, optional) – Encoder pin two, defaults to None

Methods

enc_read

move

move_distance

move_distance Move a specified distance speed and direction.

set_direction

stop

stop Stop the motor clear any remaining move distance, and reset the init pos.
move_distance(direction, speed, distance)[source]¶

move_distance Move a specified distance speed and direction.

Parameters:

  • direction (_type_) – Direction to move

  • speed (int) – Speed to move

  • distance (int) – Distance to move

stop()[source]¶

stop Stop the motor clear any remaining move distance, and reset the init pos.
